data.eml:eml: Descriptions of the spermathecae and male genitalia of the species of Crocidium Loew described by Hesse (Diptera, Bombyliidae, Crocidiinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lamas, Carlos José Einicker, Evenhuis, Neal L., Couri, Márcia Souto (2002): Descriptions of the spermathecae and male genitalia of the species of Crocidium Loew described by Hesse (Diptera, Bombyliidae, Crocidiinae). Zootaxa 45: 1-12, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.155823
